newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Ansaldo in accord with India's Kirloskar.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Ansaldo in accord with India's Kirloskar.

text.p: Italy's Ansaldo has concluded a collaboration accord in industrial automation and energy generation with India's Kirloskar Vijav group.
The agreement also envisages the creation of a 50-50 joint venture for the integrated development of systems know-how in the industrial automation field, an Ansaldo statement said.
This will allow Ansaldo to design and manufacture locally complete generators at competitive prices, it said.
Kirloskar is one of India's major industrial groups with a turnover of $700 million. Ansaldo has been present in India since 1958.
